column1: 22979,Amazing Spider-Man Family (2008) #3,3,7710,248,"In our Untold Tales of Spider-Man, J.M. DeMatteis is back to take us through more of Peter Parker's struggle to become a hero.  In ""The Punch,""  Pete struggles to keep his powers in check around Flash Thompson - and  discovers the negative examples a hero can set. Then, on a trip even further back in time, Matt Yocum takes us on an adventure of epic proportions with Pete's parents, Richard and Mary Parker - international parents of mystery!  Over in Mr. and Mrs. Spider-Man, during a late night hospital visit for baby May, Pete and MJ run into the Rhino - and discover even a super villain has a family.  Finally in our Told Tales of Spider-Man, take a look back at the demise of Harry Osborn in Spectacular Spider-Man #200! Rated A ...$4.99",
